# automatic(presentationViewController:)

**Type Method**

An appropriate presentation style will be chosen automatically.

## Declaration

```swift
static func automatic(presentationViewController: UIViewController? = nil) -> MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle
```

## Parameters

- **presentationViewController**: Supplying a non-nil presentationViewController will enable sheet presentation, if appropriate.

## Creating a presentation style

- **automatic(presentationViewController:)**: An appropriate presentation style will be chosen automatically.
- **callout**: Show map item detail as an annotation callout on the map.
- **callout(_:)**: Show map item detail as an annotation callout on the map
- **openInMaps**: Display a small “Open in Apple Maps” link.
- **sheet(presentedFrom:)**: Show map item detail by presenting a sheet.
